name: Small Glow Ring
effect: Emits a small, constant light
obtainedFrom: Killing Slimes in The Mines before level 40
Fishing Treasure Chests

name: Glow Ring
effect: Emits a constant light
obtainedFrom: Killing Slimes in The Mines after level 40
Killing a Skeleton in The Mines level 70-79
Destroying various barrels and boxes in The Mines

name: Small Magnet Ring
effect: Slightly increases your radius for collecting items
obtainedFrom: Destroying various barrels and boxes in The Mines
Fishing Treasure Chests

name: Magnet Ring
effect: Increases your radius for collecting items
obtainedFrom: Enemy drops in The Mines between levels 40-80
Destroying various barrels and boxes in The Mines

name: Slime Charmer Ring
effect: Prevents damage from Slimes and prevents the Slimed Buff
obtainedFrom: Reward for eradicating 1000 Slimes at the Adventurer's Guild
Adventurer's Guild (25,000g)

name: Warrior Ring
effect: Has a chance of giving a +10 Attack buff for 5 seconds after slaying a monster
obtainedFrom: Crafting
Recipe is earned at Combat skill level 4

name: Vampire Ring
effect: Restores 2 health after slaying a monster
obtainedFrom: Reward for eradicating 200 Bats at the Adventurer's Guild
Adventurer's Guild (15,000g)

name: Savage Ring
effect: Gives a 3-second +2 Speed buff after slaying a monster
obtainedFrom: Reward for eradicating 150 Void Spirits (Shadow Shaman or Shadow Brutes) at the Adventurer's Guild
Adventurer's Guild (25,000g)

name: Ring of Yoba
effect: Has a chance of making the player invincible for 5 seconds after taking damage
obtainedFrom: Crafting
Recipe is earned at Combat skill level 7

name: Sturdy Ring
effect: Halves the duration of negative buffs
obtainedFrom: Crafting
Recipe is earned at Combat skill level 1

name: Burglar's Ring
effect: Monsters drop items more often
obtainedFrom: Reward for eradicating 500 Dust Sprites at the Adventurer's Guild
Adventurer's Guild (20,000g)

name: Iridium Band
effect: Combines the effect of the Glow Ring, the Magnet Ring, and the Ruby Ring
obtainedFrom: Crafting
Recipe is earned at Combat skill level 9
Fishing Treasure Chests

name: Amethyst Ring
effect: Increases knockback by 10%
obtainedFrom: Adventurer's Guild (1,000g)

name: Topaz Ring
effect: Increases weapon precision by 10%
obtainedFrom: Adventurer's Guild (1,000g)

name: Aquamarine Ring
effect: Increases critical strike chance by 10%
obtainedFrom: Purchased from the Adventurer's Guild after reaching level 40 in The Mines (2,500g)

name: Jade Ring
effect: Increases critical strike power by 10%
obtainedFrom: Purchased from the Adventurer's Guild after reaching level 40 in The Mines (2,500g)
Fishing Treasure Chests

name: Emerald Ring
effect: Increases weapon speed by 10%
obtainedFrom: Purchased from the Adventurer's Guild after reaching level 80 in The Mines (5,000g)

name: Ruby Ring
effect: Increases attack by 10%
obtainedFrom: Purchased from the Adventurer's Guild after reaching level 80 in The Mines (5,000g)

name: Wedding Ring
effect: Allows you to propose marriage to another player in a Multiplayer game
obtainedFrom: Crafting
Recipe is can be found randomly at the Traveling Cart (500g)

name: Crabshell Ring
effect: Increases Defense by +5
obtainedFrom: Reward for eradicating 60 Rock Crabs at the Adventurer's Guild
Adventurer's Guild (15,000g)

name: Napalm Ring
effect: Slain monsters will explode, destroying objects and damaging enemies (does not damage the player)
obtainedFrom: Reward for eradicating 250 Serpents at the Adventurer's Guild
Adventurer's Guild (30,000g)
